programme.title: Smrtni grehovi - Zločin na otvorenom moru
programme.desc: Deadly Sins (2012) - Sez. 6, ep. 2, - Dokumentarna drama u kojoj se otkrivaju zločini pokrenuti skrivenim ljudskim instinktima.

programme.title: Smrtni grehovi - Surovi poroci
programme.desc: Deadly Sins (2012) - Sez. 6, ep. 3, - Dokumentarna drama u kojoj se otkrivaju zločini pokrenuti skrivenim ljudskim instinktima.

programme.title: Ljubav ubija - Bili smo poput vatre
programme.desc: Love Kills (2017) - Sez. 1, ep. 1, - Judy i Duane oboje žude za uzbuđenjem i upuštaju se u tajnu vezu. No iskre koje vrcaju između njih uskoro izmiču kontroli.

programme.title: Ljubav ubija - Prokletstvo naše budućnosti
programme.desc: Love Kills (2017) - Sez. 1, ep. 2, - Kad se bivši zločinci Chance i Danielle upoznaju, iskre vrcaju na sve strane. No hoće li se ponovno odati kriminalu kada ne budu mogli plaćati račune?

programme.title: Mreža laži: Mreža laži
programme.desc: Web of Lies (2014) - Sez. 2, ep. 6 - Beri je slučajno detonirao bombu kada je šutnuo paket. Započinje internet teror protiv njegovog sina, zbog čega se policija pita ko bi želeo da ih povredi.

programme.title: Mreža laži - Previše brz, previše mlad
programme.desc: Web of Lies (2014) - Sez. 2, ep. 7, - Nakon problematičnog detinjstva, 13-godišnja Kristina živi srećno sa svojom voljenom tetkom Šeli. Ali pošto njenjen život na mreži biva otkriven, on priča tragičniju priču.

programme.title: Ubio bih zbog tebe - Brvnara u šumi
programme.desc: I'd Kill for You (2013) - Sez. 2, ep. 7, - Danijel i Nikol se lepo provode, a kada Den ponudi Nikolinom ocu Džonu brzu zaradu, on ne može da odbije. Ali uz novac i moć dolaze posledice.

programme.title: Ubio bih zbog tebe - Teksaška crna magija
programme.desc: I'd Kill for You (2013) - Sez. 2, ep. 8, - Koliko daleko biste otišli zbog osobe koju volite? Ova emisija podiže veo tajne sa neverovatnih zločina u kojima je ljubav ili odanost jedne osobe izabrana umesto tuđeg života.

programme.title: Izdaja - Krv u vodi
programme.desc: Betrayed (2016) - Sez. 2, ep. 7, - Matrijarh Keti Stroup je razumna glava porodice. Ali, da li bi njeno upravljanje svačijim životom moglo da bude razlog koji je doveo do užasne izdaje?

programme.title: Izdaja - Ubistvo s namerom
programme.desc: Betrayed (2016) - Sez. 2, ep. 8, - 27-godišnja Lora Akerson se nada novom početku u novom gradu. Ali baš kada život počne da se odvija onako kako se nadala, ona iznenada nestaje.

programme.title: U potrazi: Džon Volš - Tragično oteti
programme.desc: In Pursuit with John Walsh (2019) - Sez. 3, ep. 12, - Džon lovi čoveka optuženog za ubistvo svoje devojke i otmicu njihovog malog sina. Kasnije, Džon i Kal traže mladu ženu koja je oteta 2017.

programme.title: U potrazi: Džon Volš - Čekanje u zasedi
programme.desc: In Pursuit with John Walsh (2019) - Sez. 4, ep. 1, - Džon lovi Vilijama Strenda, za koga policija veruje da je ubio svoju bivšu devojku. Kasnije, Kal progoni Lesli Lagrot, osumnjičenog za seksualno zlostavljanje žena.

programme.title: Zli umovi - Gnevne ubice
programme.desc: Most Evil (2006) - Sez. 3, ep. 1, - Bilo šta može da izazove gnevnog ubicu. Džerald Judžin Stano priznao je da je ubio 33 žene u 1970-tim, dok je Bendžamin Atkins silovao i zadavio 11 prostitutki.

programme.title: Zli umovi - Manipulatori
programme.desc: Most Evil (2006) - Sez. 3, ep. 2, - Tejlor Helcer je imao plan da prihvati Satanu i uništi Mormonsku crkvu. Ali, u uvrnutoj potrazi, on i njegovi sledbenici iskasapili su troje ljudi i pogubili još dvoje.

programme.title: Izigrano poverenje - Brat protiv brata
programme.desc: Broken Trust (2018) - Sez. 1, ep. 8, - Braća Edvin i Endi Hos vode uspešan posao uređenja pejzaža, ali razlike u mišljenju dovode do optužbi za proneveru i konačno do nasilja.

programme.title: Ovde živi zlo - Moj brat je pustio zlo da uđe
programme.desc: Evil Lives Here (2016) - Sez. 8, ep. 11, - Kristina Tomas ostaje verna svom bratu Džonu Vajtu posle dva užasna zločina. No, kada se to ponovi, ona se pita da li je on prerušeni đavo.

programme.title: Faking It: Tears of a Crime - Chris Watts: A Faking It Special
programme.desc: Faking It: Tears of a Crime (2021) - Sez. 4, ep. 12, - When Shanann Watts and her two daughters vanished from their home, husband Chris gradually confessed to being responsible. Now, experts examine TV news interviews and interrogation recordings to pick out his chilling tell-tale clues.

programme.title: Intrigantni slučaj Natalije Grejs - Branet protiv Barneta
programme.desc: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace (2023) - Sez. 1, ep. 5, - Kako se Majklovo suđenje približava, on prebacuje krivicu na Kristin. On ima tračak nade kada sudija odbaci bilo kakvu diskusiju o Natalijinim godinama tokom suđenja.

programme.title: Intrigantni slučaj Natalije Grejs - Udari ili budi udaren
programme.desc: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace (2023) - Sez. 1, ep. 6, - Nakon godina iščekivanja, Majklovo suđenje je konačno u toku. Pojavljuje se misteriozni novi svedok i nudi osuđujuće svedočenje koje bi moglo da uništi Majkla.

programme.title: Izopačene sestre - Vrata od dvorišta
programme.desc: Twisted Sisters (2018) - Sez. 3, ep. 8, - U Ilinoisu, rivalitet između sestara polazi po zlu kada jedna sestra angažuje lokalnu bandu da se osveti u njeno ime.

programme.title: Tv Transfrontaliera - Tg Regionale FVG
programme.desc: Telegiornale regionale del Friuli Venezia Giulia. Regionalni dnevnik v italijanskem jeziku za FJK.

programme.title: Curiosità istriane
programme.desc: Una serie di curiosita’ che ci illustrano alcuni momenti di particolare interesse del passato dell’Istria o ci presentano i personaggi più noti del territorio. Zanimivi dogodki iz zgodovine Istre in najpomembnejše osebnosti ki so delovale in živele v preteklosti slovenskega primorja.

programme.title: Oramusica
programme.desc: Trasmissione di videoclip musicali. Oddaja z glasbenimi videoposnetki.

programme.title: Videomotori
programme.desc: Magazine di automobilismo. Oddaja o avtomobilizmu.

programme.title: Spezzoni d’ archivio, "Panorama culturale" 1986
programme.desc: Mozaik posnetkov arhivskih oddaji. Nekatere posvečene osebam in dogodkom naših krajev.

programme.title: Nino Benvenuti: Da Isola d’Istria ai ring di tutto il mondo - documentario
programme.desc: Nino Benvenuti: Da Isola d’Istria ai ring di tutto il mondo - documentario Serija dokumentarnih oddaj o krajih, tradicjah in ljudeh, ki prestavljajo identiteto Istre.

programme.title: Petrarca
programme.desc: Petrarca si propone di raccontare l’Italia attraverso storie di libri e librerie, scrittori, biblioteche, personaggi e mestieri collegati al libro o alla scrittura, proponendo incontri tra libri e lettori. Petrarca pripoveduje Italijo skozi zgodbe knjig in knjižnic, pisateljev, knjižnice, osebe in obrti, povezanih s knjigo ali pisanju ter predlagala srečanja med knjigami in bralci. Oddaja je namenjena tudi jeziku kina, gledališča in glasbe. Pripoveduje na nov način obraze, glasove, besede in podobe italijanske kulture, z "mešanjem" zvrsti, ki prispevajo k njenem velikim bogastvom.

programme.title: Le macroregioni - La macroregione adriatico-ionica, I pescatori dell’Adriatico
programme.desc: La pesca è l’attività economica primaria nel territorio litoraneo settentrionale del Mare Adriatico. Gestire gli stock ittici "transfrontalieri" tra diversi paesi è uno dei temi più attuali nella Macroregione adriatico-ionica. I pescatori, che vivono quotidianamente a stretto contatto con il mare, danno indicazioni su come comportarsi per preservare il patrimonio della pesca, nonostante il crescente inquinamento del mare. Ribolov je primarna gospodarska dejavnost v obmorskih krajih na severu Jadranskega morja. Upravljanja staleža rib "preko meja" med različnimi državami je eno izmed zelo aktualnih vprašanj v Jadransko Jonski makroregiji. Ribiči, ki se z morjem srečujejo vsak dan povedo kako bi najbolje ohranjali dediščino ribištva, kljub naraščanju onesnaževanja morja.

programme.title: Meridiani
programme.desc: Migranti, un’accoglienza sempre più difficile Continua senza sosta l’arrivo dei migranti dalla rotta balcanica. La Slovenia ha triplicato gli ingressi: 36mila quelli illegali dall’inizio dell’anno. Quasi 14 mila in 8 mesi nel Friuli Venezia Giulia. In aumento i minori non accompagnati. Il sistema accoglienza è al collasso e in centinaia dormono in strada. Una situazione insostenibile che necessita di un intervento europeo anche se ad oggi le politiche dei singoli stati sono tutt’altro che coese.

programme.title: Rojaki
programme.desc: Oddaja »Rojaki« je most med domovino in Slovenci, ki živijo zunaj njenih meja. Pesem, literatura, folklora in številne druge oblike izražanja ohranjajo živo slovensko besedo in tradicijo. Slovenstvo živi naprej tudi po zaslugi novih gospodarskih povezovanj, raziskovalnih in turističnih pobud ter izjemnih posameznikov, ki bogatijo naš skupen prostor. Vse to so Rojaki, spoznajte jih skupaj z nami.

programme.title: Vreme
programme.desc: Informativni

programme.title: Primorska kronika
programme.desc: PRIMORSKA KRONIKA je informativna oddaja, ki ji dajejo značaj aktualnost, verodostojnost in regionalnost. Poročamo o vsem, kar se dogaja na Primorskem, segamo od Pirana pa vse do Bovca. Razvejana dopisniška mreža omogoča, da čutimo utrip krajev, tudi najmanjših. Prav zato lahko življenje v njih slikamo tako prepričljivo in doživeto. Odzivamo se na dnevne dogodke, hkrati pa ves čas razkrivamo in opozarjamo na družbene nepravilnosti. V naši oddaji z veseljem postrežemo tudi z dobrimi novicami, ki lepšajo naš vsakdan in naredijo našo/vašo oddajo skupaj z drugimi vestmi resnično vredno ogleda.

programme.title: Tuttoggi I
programme.desc: Telegiornale Poročila

programme.title: Tg sport
programme.desc: Notiziario sportivo quotidiano. Dnevna športna oddaja.

programme.title: Tuttoggi scuola
programme.desc: Tuttoggi Scuola e’ la trasmissione che presenta il mondo scolastico in Tv. In primo piano gli Istituti della Comunita’ nazionale italiana di Slovenia e croazia, ma non solo. Ogni settimana, il martedi’, si rinnova l’appuntamento con un nuovo argomento: dall’attivita’ didattica a quella formativa. Con cadenza mensile, all’interno di Tg Scuola Ragazzi, di volta in volta, una scuola presenta il proprio Telegiornale. Tuttoggi Scuola je TV serija, ki obravnava šolsko problematiko in razkriva življenje za šolskimi klopmi. Poudarek daje predvsem inštitucijam Italijanske narodne skupnosti, tako v Sloveniji kot na Hrvaškem. V posamezni oddaji so predstavljene različne tematike, od didaktičnih do izobraževalnih. Vsak konec meseca se oddaja prelevi v TG Scuola Ragazzi, kjer nastopajo učenci posamezne šole, ki se predstavijo s svojim televizijskim dnevnikom.

programme.title: Il giardino dei sogni
programme.desc: La trasmissione e’ dedicata a un pubblico prettamente femminile, tratta temi inerenti la moda, bellezza, stile di vita nonche’ temi di carattere psicologico. Oddaja je namenjena predvsem ženskam, osredotočena je na aktualne ženske teme, modo, lepoto, življenski slog ter na psihološke tematike.

programme.title: Tuttoggi II
programme.desc: Telegiornale. Dnevnik.

programme.title: Cavana Stories, Cavana Stories
programme.desc: Cavana Stories è un documentario che intreccia le storie legate a Cavana e alla città vecchia, che rischiano di andare disperse, un viaggio per recuperare le memorie di chi oggi a Trieste non vive più. Tra i racconti di un quartiere segnato negli anni anche da una condizione di degrado vengono recuperate e scintillano storie di grandissima umanità, che mostrano un senso di vicinanza e di comunità che non deve andare dimenticato. Tra aneddoti legati alle case chiuse, alle osterie, ai musicisti di strada, momenti di grande condivisione e intimità, si intrecciano i volti e le memorie di persone che raccontano la Cavana: artisti, scrittori, artigiani, commercianti, volti noti e meno noti di Trieste. Dokumentarna oddaja.

programme.title: Oramusica - disco, Vincent Onironaura
programme.desc: Trasmissione di videoclip musicali. Oddaja z glasbenimi videoposnetki.

programme.title: Istria e... dintorni Estate
programme.desc: Programma che si occupa degli eventi che caratterizzano l’Istria e il territorio che la circonda. In ogni puntata vengono proposti dei reportage che parlano della storia, della cultura, delle tradizioni e degli eventi che interessano il territorio compreso fra Slovenia, Italia e Croazia. La versione estiva propone la storie piu’ belle e interessanti trasmesse nel periodo autunnale-invernale. Kulturno-informativna oddaja o dogodkih in zanimivostih mest na območiju Istre in njenih sosednjih pokraijn Slovenije, Italije in Hrvaške. Novinarji kulturnega uredništva pripravljajo reportaže o različnih prireditvah, krajih zgodovinskega in arhitekturnega pomena z njihovimi arheološkimi odkritji ter prispevke o znanih osebnostih na področju umetnosti, politike, novinarstva in znanosti.

programme.title: Artevisione Magazine, Massimiliano Melchionne
programme.desc: Tedenska oddaja o umetnosti in kulturi. Gost oddaje je italijanski fotograf Massimiliano Melchionne.

programme.title: Per non dimenticare l’8 settembre 1943-documentario
programme.desc: Per non dimenticare l’8 settembre 1943-documentario Serija posvečena Drugi Svetovni vojni, je namenjena raziskavi in novejših razkritji na tem področju. Cilj je boljše razumevanje najvažnejših dogodkov v novejši zgodovini.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Royale
programme.desc: When the Enterprise is advised by a passing Klingon vessel that there is strange debris in orbit around a nearby planet, they investigate only to find a piece of a NASA spacecraft emblazoned with the US flag.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Time Squared
programme.desc: Deep in space, the Enterprise comes across a Federation shuttlecraft that is floating in space and without much power but which does exhibit the life signs of one human aboard.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Icarus Factor
programme.desc: Riker's delight at being offered command of the USS Aries turns to frustration when the man sent to prepare him for his mission is his estranged father; Worf's behavior leads Wesley to delve into Klingon tradition.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Pen Pals
programme.desc: On arriving at a newly identified planetary group, the crew finds that the entire system is unstable.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Q Who
programme.desc: Q tries to prove that Picard needs him as part of their crew by hurling the Enterprise 7,000 light-years away from where they encounter the Borg for the first time.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Samaritan Snare
programme.desc: With Picard away for routine surgery, the Enterprise responds to an apparent distress call from a Pakled vessel.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Up the Long Ladder (aka "Send In the Clones")
programme.desc: When Starfleet receives an Earth-like distress signal from deep in space, the Enterprise is sent to investigate.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Manhunt
programme.desc: The Enterprise is transporting delegates to a diplomatic conference dealing with Federation membership. Counselor Troi is more than just a bit embarrassed when her mother Lwaxanna, as outrageous as ever, arrives on board the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Emissary
programme.desc: The Enterprise is ordered to proceed to an emergency Rendez-Vous to collect a special envoy who is traveling from Starbase 153 to meet them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Peak Performance
programme.desc: The crew of the Enterprise participates in war games.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Shades of Gray
programme.desc: Riker returns from an away team mission wounded and infected with microbes from the planet below. He is soon in a coma in sick bay, the microbes having fused itself to his sciatic nerve and impeding his normal functions.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Evolution
programme.desc: The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Ensigns of Command
programme.desc: After a century of silence, the Enterprise receives a message from the Sheliac system informing them that they have discovered a human colony on a world in their sector.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E13 - Terra Firma
programme.desc: Crichton has arrived on Earth. Even though the Moya crew relaxes on Earth and are treated as VIPs, Crichton can't seem to adjust to life on Earth.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E14 - Twice Shy
programme.desc: Moya takes on a new passenger, Talikaa. However, Talikaa turns out to be an alien in disguise and is intent on harvesting the crew's neural energy.

programme.title: Flood - Part 1

programme.title: Flood - Part 2

programme.title: The First 48 - The Invader
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a father of three is gunned down in front of his family during a deadly crime spree. Detectives race to track down his killer before anyone else gets hurt.

programme.title: The First 48 - Dead Stop/Uninvited
programme.desc: In Atlanta, when a young father is found dead in his home by his girlfriend, detectives track down the killer and find things are not as they appear. In Tulsa, a teenager is fatally shot, sending the Tulsa team on a desperate search for the motive.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a homeless man is beaten and stabbed to death, leading detectives to witnesses that live under the bridge where he was discovered.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Break Up/ No Good Deed
programme.desc: A young woman in Mobile is found dead behind an abandoned building, and detectives need her boyfriend to help solve the case. A young father's murder case sends Atlanta detectives to the Poconos Mountains in search of his killers.

programme.title: The First 48 - Late Night Ambush/Fire & Fury
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a father is gunned down in a parking lot by a killer lying in wait. In Mobile, an elderly man dies from a suspicious fire in his apartment.

programme.title: The First 48 - Jackpot
programme.desc: When a man is found shot dead in his driveway, an abandoned truck leads Tulsa Homicide to several potential suspects, but not everything is as it seems.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Loose Lips Sink Ships
programme.desc: The Sheriff and his team face a tough decision and the consequences of one participant's actions put the remaining participants in very real danger.

programme.title: 60 Days In - You Don't Belong Here
programme.desc: Now that one of the participants has blown his/her cover, Sheriff Lamb and his team are forced to make a decision: end the program early, or risk the lives of the remaining participants.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Reunion Special
programme.desc: For the first time, all seven participants will meet with the Sheriff and his team to discuss the craziest moments from their time in the Pinal County Jail.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Aaron
programme.desc: On January 31, 2011, 14-year-old Aaron shot his neighbor, 14-year-old Alana, in her home in Harlem, Georgia. Aaron was sentenced to life without parole at 15.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Consummate Murder
programme.desc: The case of an Irish woman, Rachel O’Reilly, her savage murder, and the groundbreaking investigation that put her remorseless killer behind bars.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Unravelling the Murder of Janet Commins
programme.desc: The case of a brutal murder, a terrible injustice, and how a new, dedicated police team and DNA profiling eventually caught up with the killer, 40 years after the crime was committed.

programme.title: The First 48 - Roadside Burning / Blood Ties (#19)
programme.desc: In Dallas, a motorist passing along a highway discovers a man's body with a knife wound to the chest and his genitals burnt up.

programme.title: The First 48 - Hunt for Teeth / Coyote Blue (#17)
programme.desc: In Kansas City, KS, Capt. John Cosgrove and his team of homicide detectives must track down a man suspected of beating his best friend to death with a cinder block.

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Betrayal (#20)
programme.desc: With Hurricane Jeanne threatening Miami, Sgt. Joe Schillaci and Det. Olga Rome must solve the murder of the owner of a popular strip club. The club's surveillance video reveals three men ambushing the victim.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Prince of Darkness / Last Words
programme.desc: In Harris County Texas, a young mother of three daughters is found in her trailer with her throat slashed. Investigators arrest her alleged killer with the help of a key witness.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Good Man Down
programme.desc: In Cleveland, Ohio, an aspiring police officer is gunned down during a vicious nightclub brawl, and it's all caught on tape.

programme.title: After the First 48 - A Simple Plan
programme.desc: In Harris County Texas, a 41-year-old woman is killed in her home by four masked men. Investigators have an idea of who did, but can they get enough evidence to prove it?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Brutal Business
programme.desc: In the Dallas Neighborhood of Oak Cliff, two young men are shot in the head inside a drug house, their bodies, found burned in the trunk of a car. Investigators scramble to find eyewitnesses to the crime.

programme.desc: Police investigate the murder of a husband and his pregnant wife.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Way Of The Warrior, Part 1
programme.desc: When the Klingon Empire ends its peace treaty with the Federation, Sisko must help Klingon Starfleet officer Worf decide where his loyalties lie.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Way Of The Warrior, Part 2
programme.desc: When the Klingon Empire ends its peace treaty with the Federation, Sisko must help Klingon Starfleet officer Worf decide where his loyalties lie.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Hippocratic Oath
programme.desc: Held prisoner by a group under the leadership of rebel Jem'Hadar, Bashir and O'Brien clash over Bashir's desire to help their captors escape Dominion rule.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Visitor
programme.desc: When a tragic accident causes Sisko to vanish before his son's eyes, young Jake begins a lifelong obsession to bring him back.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Indiscretion
programme.desc: Forced to bring Dukat along on a personal mission, Kira discovers the real reason her nemesis wants to accompany her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Rejoined
programme.desc: Jadzia Dax must choose between her feelings and the rules of Trill society when she is reunited with the wife of one of Dax's previous hosts.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Starships Down
programme.desc: A fierce battle with the Jem'Hadar leaves the Defiant trapped in a planet's volatile atmosphere.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Little Green Men
programme.desc: A mishap sends Quark, Rom, and Nog back in time to Earth in 1947 in Roswell, New Mexico, where military forces mistake them for alien invaders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Sword Of Kahless
programme.desc: Kor, a revered Klingon warrior, sets out with Worf and Dax in search of a mythical, ancient artifact they believe has the power to unite the Klingon Empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Our Man Bashair
programme.desc: Posing as a 1960's secret agent in a malfunctioning Hootsuite program, Bashir is all that stands between his trapped fellow officers and certain death.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Home Front
programme.desc: Evidence that Changelings are targeting Earth sends Sisko back to his home planet, where he and Odo must prevent--or prepare for--war with the Dominion.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Preparing Earth for war with the Dominion, Sisko, and Odo discover evidence of a Starfleet plot to seize control of the planet from the Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Crossfire
programme.desc: Odo's hidden feelings for Kira interfere with his duty to protect the Bajoran First Minister--who also happens to be attracted to her.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files - Cold Case Files

programme.title: Afrobeats 24/7 TV programme
programme.desc: Afrobeats are primarily produced in Lagos, Accra and London. Paul Gilroy of The Black Atlantic reflects on the changing London music scene as a result of changing demographics: 'We are moving towards an African majority that is diverse in both its cultural habits and its relationship to colonial and post-colonial governance, so the move away from Caribbean domination needs to be placed in this environment'. Afro-pop (not to be confused with Afrobeat or Afroswing), also known as Afro-fusion (also called Afropop and Afrofusion), is an umbrella term used to describe popular music from West Africa and the diaspora originally developed in Nigeria.

programme.title: NASA TV Media programme
programme.desc: NASA TV airs a variety of regularly scheduled, pre-recorded educational and public relations programming 24 hours a day on its various channels. The network also provides an array of live programming, such as 24-hour coverage of missions, events (spacewalks, media interviews, educational broadcasts), press conferences and rocket launches.

programme.title: Earth TV programme
programme.desc: EarthTV Network GmbH je njemačka satelitska televizijska mreža koja emitira prijenose uživo sa svoje mreže kamera diljem svijeta. Kamere se nalaze u poznatim gradovima kao i u manje poznatim mjestima. EarthTV kamere obično prikazuju plaže, planine, primorska odmarališta ili obrise velikih gradova.
